content.text:
# List of wars involving Tonga

This is a list of wars involving Tonga.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style= rowspan="1" |Conflict
! style= rowspan="1" width=170px| Combatant 1
! style= rowspan="1" width=170px| Combatant 2
! style= rowspan="1" width=340px| Results
! style= rowspan="1" width=100px| Casualties
|-
|Civil war(15th century–1470)
| colspan="2" |
|'Result of Civil conflict / status quo ante bellum'
* The Tongans were driven out of Wallis and Futuna.
* Tuʻi Tonga Kauʻulufonua I ceded temporal authority to his brother Moʻungāmotuʻa, replacing the Tuʻi Tonga dynasty with the Tu'i Ha'atakalaua dynasty.
|Unknown
|-
|Civil war(17th century)
| colspan="2" |
|'Result of Civil conflict / status quo ante bellum'
* Mataelehaʻamea, the ''Tu'i Kanokupolu, established the supremacy of his dynasty after a war against the Tuʻi Haʻatakalaua, Vaea.
|Unknown
|-
|Civil war(1799–1852)
| colspan="2" |
|'Result of Civil conflict / status quo ante bellum
|Unknown

Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan
|style="background:#FFD0D0"| Defeat'''
* Fall of the Taliban government in Afghanistan
* Destruction of al-Qaeda camps
* Over two thirds of al-Qaeda's leadership demolished
* Occupation of Afghanistan
* Establishment of a new Afghan government
* Killing of Osama bin Laden
* Resurgence of Taliban
* Withdrawal of allied forces
|Unknown
